Text saved: Asteroids are big rocks that fly in space. Now NASA is trying to find smaller asteroids. These asteroids are 140 metres wide or bigger. NASA thinks there are about 25,000 asteroids of this size. Until now, they found about 8,000. This means 17,000 are still not on their list. In 2013, a small asteroid exploded over a city in Russia. It was only 19 metres wide, but it hurt 1,200 people. So, these middle-sized asteroids are a serious danger if they come near Earth.
